"Ma foi, sire, nous ferons ce qui sera dans noire possibility, sire"' 1 he answered gaily, raising nevertheless ironic smiles among the gentlemen of the Tsar's suite by his poor French.

stationed himself a little behind the Emperor. The Apsheron men, excited by the Tsar's pres- ence, passed in step before the Emperors and their suite
